title: Pingu in the City (2018)
alternative_title: Pingu in the City, ピングー in ザ・シティ
description: Pingu continues his misadventures in the big city, now with even more different jobs for him to mess up as a result of his adorable clumsiness and affinity for mischief. Join him on his curious capers as he wreaks havoc across the city.
